name: Fish Eyes
description: You are a blind fisherman. Catch enough fish to survive each day! This game uses audio in place of a GUI, so to know what's happening, have your speakers or headphones on. :) Left mouse to begin cast, let go to toss. Hold spacebar to wind in your lure. Hold R to reset your rod's position. Press T to check how late into the day it is, and press C to check how many fish you have caught.
